about_the_game:
Greetings, everyone! Welcome to "Mike's Movie Corner" Today, we're spotlighting the chilling live-action FMV game "108 Silly Ways to Die." Our hero, The Man (a.k.a. Cai Chen), is an average college student with an extraordinary stroke of luck. He's arranged a meet-up with a female online acquaintance from his school, a rendezvous that feels like hitting the jackpot. But the meeting spot is anything but ordinary—it's an old, deserted medical college. Seizing the opportunity, The Man hurries there with a spring in his step.

Upon arrival, The Man quickly identifies The Woman, the object of his daydreams, among a group of peculiar individuals. Suddenly, she drags him into a dilapidated building.

Inside, the scene is far from ordinary. The place is littered with eerie bloodstains and repulsive corpse worms. Oddly, The Woman seems unfazed by it all, while The Man is on the brink of madness, constantly challenging her with questions and arguments. Their bickering along the way inadvertently provokes the seemingly harmless zombies lurking in the shadows.

In the FMV genre, this is the game with the highest level of difficulty. You will embark on an adventure in an unfamiliar environment with strange companions. To survive, you must carefully make every choice! Of course, death is a common occurrence in the game. By collecting all 108 ways to die, you can become a true artist of death.

An abandoned building, dark and eerie, filled with peculiar medical equipment, and you, armed with just a flashlight! Stay vigilant of your surroundings, as numerous zombies are lurking about! It's perilous here, remember, you can afford to die, but not the lady. Make your choices wisely.

While the game is terrifying, the plot also incorporates a lot of funny moments, and we believe this will be a relaxing adventure! When encountering zombies, stay calm and use your humor to defuse the situation.

When you feel that the game cannot be completed in one go, we strongly recommend that you just give up on trying to be perfect! It doesn't matter where the end of the mystery lies, it doesn't matter how the zombies originated, and it doesn't matter what the true identity of the girl traveling with you is.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains some nudity, sexual innuendo, and other sensitive content. 
Some scenes are unsettling and horrific, implying violence, bloodshed, and the mutilation of the human body. 
It may have a realistic triggering effect on players with potential sensitivities and may not be suitable for all age groups.

short_description: Caichen made an appointment with a female netizen from the same school to meet at an abandoned medical college, but was caught up in a conspiracy. Caichen planned to explore here and find a way to escape, but the sudden roar and the appearance of zombies implied that there were secrets hidden here.
